plot: Teppei is going to visit his older brother Kotaro Takamiya during a scientific conference after training with a mysterious woman named Karen for the past 11 years. However his plans for a family reunion become stalled when a woman named Aramis kills everyone in the conference to kidnap Kotaro. Teppei on the way to save his brother encounters a broken mechanical horse called B't X who revives thanks to Teppei's blood and is now his aide to save his brother from the mysterious Machine Empire.
opening_theme: "Haruka ~SAILING FOR MY DREAM~" by FENCE OF DEFENSE
"~HARUKA~ Sailing For My Dream" by FENCE OF DEFENSE
ending_theme: "僕の生き方 (Boku no Ikikata)" by Blue Boy
